description:
AI-native on-call and incident response.

Modern Slack and MS Teams native incident management—from your first alert to retrospective.

Trusted by 100s of leading companies including NVIDIA, Squarespace, Canva, Grammarly, Elastic, Tripadvisor, and Figma.

See why they rate us 5 stars on G2: https://www.g2.com/products/rootly-manage-incidents-on-slack/reviews

funding.investors: Renegade Partners, with participation from Google Gradient Ventures and XYZ Ventures
funding.raw: Rootly announced a $12 million Series A funding round on August 10, 2023, led by Renegade Partners, with participation from Google Gradient Ventures and XYZ Ventures. This brings the company's total funding to $15.2 million. The funds will be used to accelerate product roadmap, increase global engineering presence, and invest in sales and marketing.

recent_news: In 2025, Rootly received significant recognition, including a top-10 placement in Deloitte's 2025 Technology Fast 50 program for its rapid growth and innovation. The company also unveiled its "2025’s Top 50 People Making the World More Reliable" list, highlighting key individuals in the industry. Rootly launched Rootly AI Labs, a community initiative aimed at advancing reliability engineering through innovation and research, and enhanced its incident management capabilities by making its API AI-Agent-First.

all_contacts.linkedin_summary: JJ Tang's recent activity shows engagement with topics concerning AI in operations and incident management, platform engineering migrations (Spotify for Backstage to Cortex), and the strategic value of customer support for product expertise. The visible activity suggests a strong interest in modern software development, SRE, and operational efficiency. Note that full profile activity is not publicly accessible.

recommended_sequence.angle: Challenge status quo with new possibilities

analysis.why_now: Recent news shows active company momentum (product launches, partnerships)—web presence needs to keep pace with business growth. They're early in their Webflow journey (2 projects)—now is the time to establish VAN as their go-to Webflow partner before they build internal muscle or find another agency.
analysis.why_van: VAN's deep Webflow expertise is directly relevant—they're already invested in the platform and need a partner who can help them maximize that investment. VAN's performance optimization capabilities directly address their 50/100 score—we can quantify the conversion impact and deliver measurable improvement.

research_gaps: No LinkedIn activity data available—limits personalization for outreach
